title: Sell Glendronach Single Casks
metaTitle: Sell Glendronach Single Casks | 1971, 1972, 1993 Vintages | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Glendronach Single Cask whisky. We buy the 1970s and 1990s vintages (PX and Oloroso puncheons).
heroSubhead: Buying Glendronach 1971, 1972, and 1990s Single Cask releases.
introParagraph: Glendronach is the modern king of sherry bombs. Their single cask program, particularly the 1971/1972 vintages, produced some of the highest rated sherried whiskies in history.
photoChecklist: Front label showing 'Single Cask' and Vintage
Back label showing Cask # and Bottle #
conditionFactors: Cask Number: Not all casks are equal. Famous 'fruit bomb' casks trade higher.
Vintage: 1972 is the star vintage. 1993 is the modern star.
Damp Staining: Since these spend decades in humid warehouses, label staining is common but affects grade.
Wax Seals: Older single casks have wax; check for cracks.
pricingFactors: Age: 40+ year old single casks are extremely rare.
Billy Walker Era: Bottlings from the Billy Walker ownership era (pre-2016) are often preferred.
Cask Type: PX (Pedro Ximenez) vs Oloroso. PX is often darker and sweeter.
Rating: High WhiskyFun/WhiskyBase scores drive specific cask prices.

faqs.question: Why is 1972 so expensive?
faqs.answer: It was a magical year for Glendronach distillation. The liquid is legendary.

faqs.question: Is my 15 Year Old Revival valuable?
faqs.answer: If it is the pre-2015 discontinuation version, yes. The new version is standard.

faqs.question: What is 'Grandeur'?
faqs.answer: A premium batch release of old stock (24+ years). Highly collected.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 1968?
faqs.answer: Yes, the 1968 vintage is historically significant.

faqs.question: Do you buy Allardice 18?
faqs.answer: Older bottlings (pre-2016) fetch a premium. Current bottling is standard.

faqs.question: What about 'Recherch√©'?
faqs.answer: The 1968 44 Year Old? Yes, we buy it.
